display_long_description:
🦍 **BRICK MANIA: UNLEASH YOUR INNER BRICK 🦍**

Shrink down to action figure size and explore an exciting room as a brick. With no legs and a lot of personality, you’ll run on your hands through various fun-filled activities.  

🦠 **BUILT IN MODS** 🦠

Explore the COOLEST mods that are easy to get. Rockets, Fly, No Clip, Speed Hacks, X Ray, Teleport, Laptop, and much more!

📸 **FREE CAMERA MOD: MOST ADVANCED CAMERA 📸**

Our built-in camera mod lets you switch between first-person, third-person, and other exciting perspectives to enhance your gameplay experience.

🏠 **GAME MODES🏠**

Have fun and talk with other bricks in our casual mode or show your inner brick and jump into an infection lobby. More game modes soon to come..

❗️❗️**BIG UPDATES CONSTANTLY❗️❗️**

We do our best to get out updates every week or every other week to best support our community. We built what the community wants!


🏀 **SHOOT HOOPS LIKE NEVER BEFORE** 🏀 

Hit the basketball court for some epic trick shots. Whether you’re a baller or just want hit some jumpers, the court is yours.




🛍️ **EXPLORE THE MALL AND GET COSMETICS 🛍️**

Visit our in-game mall and deck out your brick with an array of cosmetics. From funky outfits to stylish accessories, there’s something for everyone.

🥳 **JOIN THE BRICK MANIA NOW 🥳**

Ready to experience life as a brick? Join the Brick Mania now and embark on a tiny, yet massive adventure. Play for free and let the fun begin! Join our Discord to get support or find people to play with: https://discord.gg/brickmania
